attributes.action: Prime Minister to say 'The Game is up' to end the Game.
attributes.additional_details:
The commonly accepted rules of the mind game 'The Game' require the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom to say 'The Game is up' in order to end The Game.

The Game is an infuriating mind game which stifles productivity as players seek out more initiative ways to play. By ending The Game, the Prime Minister could rid society of this nuisance once and for all.
